other_title: おちこぼれフルーツタルト (Japanese)
plot: First-year high school student Ino Sakura heads to Tokyo to pursue becoming an idol. She teams up with fellow Nezumi Dorm residents — unpopular former child actor Roko, musician Hayu, and model Nina — to form the new idol unit Fruit Tart. These dropout idols get back on their feet and enter the world of show business to prevent their dorm from being demolished. (from manga)
opening_theme: "Kibō Darake no Everyday!" (Every Day is Filled With Hope) by Fruit Tart
